name: Tomar the Love Angel [GGJ20]
description:
Tomar is the Janitor for Cupid and his legion of Love Angels.

He wants to take on the mantle of becoming a love angel, but his understanding of the job is very uninformed.
What happens next WILL shock YOU!

Featuring a broad range of music, shootey enemies, warm feelings!

Made for Global Game Jam 2020
